text: Dario Bijelić (born May 18, 2004) is a Croatian professional footballer. He plays as the defender for Austrian Second League club Liefering. He also played for the FC Salzburg squad in the UEFA Youth League 2021-22 season and the U18 team of the Red Bull Academy.profile Dario Bijelić ==Career== He started in the youth of FC Liefering and FC Red Bull Salzburg. 2018 he went to the FC Red Bull Salzburg Academy where he played in the U15, U16 and U18 teams. In February 2022, he debuted for FC Liefering when he was in the starting team versus SKN St. Pölten. ===National team=== Dario Bijelić played for the U18 team six matches and three for the U19 team. ==References== Category:2004 births Category:Living people Category:Croatian footballers Category:FC Liefering players Category:Association football defenders
title: Dario Bijelić
